requirements.requirement: Ability to full manage suppliers while still agnostic to Block
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Ability for vendors to have multiple 'capabilities'
requirements.notes: Phase 1, 2 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Must be able to rank each vendor within a capability with a tier
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Must be able to manage Customer Concession Vendors
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Must be able to record vendor warehouse locations and shipping cut off times on Vendor Account
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: On Capability record, we must be able to include 'notes' visable to internal (Block) users only
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Ability for vendors to be connected to multiple customers
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Must be able to have multiple users under 1 account
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: User must be able to see who is logged in from homepage
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Homepage must default to Open Requests
requirements.notes: Phase 1,2 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Requests must order by oldest on top
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Requests (SRCs) must display with Time Open, SRC #, Requesting Customer, Material, Qty Requested and any notes customer put in at time of submission
requirements.notes: Phase 2 - High priority

requirements.requirement: When responding from homepage view, user must be able to press 'unavailable' button without drilling into SRC
requirements.notes: Phase 3 - High priority

requirements.requirement: From homepage view, Vendor must be able to view their connected customers
requirements.notes: Phase 2 - Medium priority

requirements.requirement: From homepage view, vendor must be able to see Roll up of Pending Fulfillments
requirements.notes: Phase 2 - Medium priority

requirements.requirement: From homepage view, vendor must be able to see Pending Fulfilments, Request History and Order History
requirements.notes: Phase 2 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Vendor must be able to 'search' each list view (Open Requests, Pending Fulfillments, Request History, Order History)
requirements.notes: Phase 2 - Medium priority

requirements.requirement: Pending Fulfillments tab must display  PO#, Customer, Item Description, Total, Age Open (measured by time passed since PO record was created, until PO record confirmed), Confirmed. Button to click in to to view Purchase Records, or hyperlink PO#
requirements.notes: Phase 3 - Medium priority

requirements.requirement: Request History View: Tiem Open (shows vendor response time), Sourcing Item #, Customer Name, Item Description, Qty, Status / Disposition (rename disposition 'condition'), Pricing (EX/OR). Ability to click into SRC to view record (or add'l button to click into to view).
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Vendor must see SRC#, Item Description, Customer Name, Created Date, Requested Qty adn Request Notes (what customer entered at time of request)
requirements.notes: Phase 3 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Vendor to be able to respond from email without logging into portal
requirements.notes: Phase 3 - Medium priority

requirements.requirement: Vendor must be able to click 'no stock button'
requirements.notes: Phase 3 - Medium priority

requirements.requirement: Buttons at bottom of SRC: Submit Quote, Clone, No Stock
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: To submit quote, vendor must enter Exchange Price, Outright Price, Condition, Warranty Period, Warranty Type
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Optional fields on SRC: Alternative Part Number, Date of Manufacturer, Item Usage.
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Quantity' field on SRC should default to 1, and be renamed to 'Qty available'
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: New Check Box: 'This Item is on Backorder'
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: If vendor Submits Quote, it keeps them on SRC record with a 'submitted' notification and allows them to clone it for a second option (third, 4th)
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Vendor must be able to view all connected cloned options in their history
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Vendor must be able to view customer user on the EMA and send messages, files, photos, etc
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Vendor must be able to click into order from 'Pending Fulfilments' view and from link in email
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Vendor must see same view as customer here: Recap of purchase fields (Customer Name, PO#, Issued Date, Total USE
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Vendor must be able to click 'Confirm Order' Button
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Vendor must be able to enter tracking, Serial Number, RMA number
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Vendor must be able to save all or one of the fields above. Notification only fires to customer when all 3 fields are entered
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Vendor must be able to send and receive messages on sourcing record (notifications firing for each)

requirements.requirement: Vendor must be able to send/recieve notifications on order record
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Once a sourcing record has been purchased, vendor may still use EMA on that record but guided to PO record if messages are related to order itself
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Vendor must receive a notification to the email (on the capability) for a new request
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Vendor must receive a notification via email for a PO
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Vendor must receive a notificaiton via email for a chatter (EMA)
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Vendor must have ability to click into link on every email notification to be taken directly to that record
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Vendor must be able to receive orders for warranty replacement from customers
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: FAQ tab on SW Homepage

requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Vendor should be able to Cancel a PO if they can no longer fulfil it
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: If vendor does not response to an SRC within 7 days, the record should automatically move to history as a 'No Response' status (ie: removed from homepage, timer stops)

requirements.requirement: Ability for Vendor to Export Views / Data from portal
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Any connection to Legendary - and fully agnostic to Block's SF org
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: In SW, There will not be an editable 'status'
requirements.notes: Phase 1, 2 - High priority

requirements.requirement: In SW, there will not be a 'cancel' button
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: in SW, there will not be a 'save' button
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: UX must be highly intuitive (like amazon) and buyer must be able to be guided thorugh the process (on-screen tutorial)
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Multiple users under one account
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Home Page must default to Open Requests
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Home Page must display their Vendors, Open Requests, Request History, Order History, SRC History and Pending Orders
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: List views for each (Open Requests, Request History, Order History, SRC History, Pending ORders) must be searchable / filterable
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Request History must show all created Reqs that were not purchased
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Open Request View must list: Req / Customer Ref #, Item Description, Sourcing Status, Created By and Created Date
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Open Request View must show newest on top
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Home page must list Bell Icon for EMA notifications
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Ability for user to search PN or description to see Material Options
requirements.notes: Phase 1,2 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Ability for SWP user to fill out 'notes' for each Request
requirements.notes: Phase 1,2 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Ability for SWP user to create a new Material
requirements.notes: Phase 1,2 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Ability for user to create a Requisition with multiple requests (Req items) on it
requirements.notes: Phase 1,2 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Ability for Buyer to Add a Customer Reference Number
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Ability for a Req Item to automatically connect to the connected vendors in the right 'bucket'
requirements.notes: Phase 1 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Notification launches via email to vendor when Req Item is created
requirements.notes: Phase 2 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Email Notification to Customer when Vendor quotes
requirements.notes: Phase 2 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Auto Archiving: Reqs open for 7 days or longer must automatically be archived
requirements.notes: Phase 3 - Medium priority

requirements.requirement: Buyer must be able to view Archived Reqs (request history)
requirements.notes: Phase 2 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Buyer must be able to click into Req and see all requested Req Items
requirements.notes: Phase 2 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Under req item, Buyer must view all SRC options in one view to do a 'quick select' of their preferred choice
requirements.notes: Phase 3 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Customer must have ability to edit originally requested quantity for a Req Item
requirements.notes: Phase 3 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Quantity should default to quantity customer REQUESTED
requirements.notes: Phase 3 - Medium priority

requirements.requirement: Email notification to Customer when vendor sends EMA message
requirements.notes: Phase 3 - High priority

requirements.requirement: Ability for customer to see vendor that would be receiving EMA (vendor contact)
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Ability for customer to send an EMA to a vendor on any SRC
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: EMA: Ability to upload pictures / docs
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: EMA: Banner that says 'Do Not Upload PO here'
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: EMA should live on every single SRC record
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: From Req Item, buyer must be able to add SRCs to cart (in doing so, must confirm quantity and purchase type)
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Buyer must be able to check out with multiple SRCs if one doesn't meet requested qty
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Check Out Page must list link to T&C's for purchasing parts through portal
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Check out page must recap purchase info: Description of material, Vendor purchasing it from, Req #, Buyer Name, Total cost
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Check out page must include qty purchased, unit cost and total for each part (Req item)
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Check Out page must require a PO#
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Check Out page must require 1 of 2 options: Hard copy PO to be uploaded (default) or Manual Shipping form to be be completed
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Manual Shipping must require: Shipping Method Drop Down (Fedex shipping levels, UPS shipping levels, etc), Shipping Account number, Recipeint First and last names, Recipient phone,  Ship To Address
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Buyer should be able to select / edit from drop down of addresses, or be able to add another address (that will moving forward be on their drop down list)
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Check out page must give option for buyer to add additional emails for post-sale notifications
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Check out page must contain a 'Special Instructions' text box. If text is entered here, it must display on the PO notification email received by the vendor AND on the PO view once the vendor clicks in
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Notification to vendor must fire when buyer presses 'Submit PO to Vendor' button.
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: After Customer submits their PO, Customer should see completed PO record with attachments and a 'Thank you for your order!' confirmation of some sort.  If they X out of this, they should be taken back to their home page.
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Once Vendor Ships Order, PO moves to 'Order History' on SWP Buyer Homepage
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Order History must list the following columns: PO#, Vednor, Description (material purchased), Quantity, Net Unit Amount, Serial #'s, Tracking Numeber, RMA #, Purchase Date, and ability to click into the PO record and view purchase details
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: PO Record must allow buyer to view hard copy PO, materials purchased, the ability to click and view the SRC and access EMA records and (post shipment) the Tracking, SN adn RMA #
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Customer must be able to initiate a warranty replacement order off of the original Req
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Ability for a Customer to Indicate what was purchased but process order outside of portal
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: FAQ tab on SWP Homepage
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Materials should show customers and vendors System information
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: From the Pending Orders View, the Customer should be able to select 'Cancel PO'
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: If Order was cancelled, the customer should get a Pop up asking if they want to close out the Requisition as Not Needed or to purchase a different SRC (ie: They can add another option to the cart and check out again, as the record was re-opened once they cancelled their first PO)
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: After customer submits order and goes to PO Confirmaiton view, it should tell them next steps
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.requirement: Once customer chooses Req Item(s) desired in Checkout Process, the remaining Req Item(s) should move to canceled or archived (pop up question or automatically)
requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP

requirements.notes: No matching response found in RFP
